bibliographic-data.invention-title: Audio/video service quality analysis of customer/agent interaction

abstract.p: A method includes receiving a storable representation of an audio/video interaction between an agent of a business and a customer. The storable representation is analyzed to determine the service quality provided to the customer by the agent. Analysis data associated with the audio/video interaction is generated. An apparatus includes a storage device configured to receive and store the storable representation of the audio/video interaction. A report generator is configured to generate analysis data, which is fed back to the agent and represents the quality of service rendered by the agent to the customer. The agent can be informed of at least one agent performance element that was well performed and at least one agent performance element that could be performed even better.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: AUDIO/VIDEO SERVICE QUALITY ANALYSIS OF CUSTOMER/AGENT INTERACTION
ANALYSE DE QUALITE DE SERVICE AUDIO/VIDEO D'INTERACTION CLIENT/AGENT

nplcit.text: The technical aspects identified in the present application (Art. 92 EPC) are considered part of common general knowledge. Due to their notoriety no documentary evidence is found to be required. For further details see the reference below. XP002456252

bibliographic-data.invention-title: AUDIO/VIDEO SERVICE QUALITY ANALYSIS OF CUSTOMER/AGENT INTERACTION
ANALYSE DE QUALITE DE SERVICE AUDIO/VIDEO D'INTERACTION CLIENT/AGENT
AUDIO/VIDEO SERVICE QUALITY ANALYSIS OF CUSTOMER/AGENT INTERACTION
ANALYSE DE QUALITE DE SERVICE AUDIO/VIDEO D'INTERACTION CLIENT/AGENT

abstract.p: A method includes receiving a storable representation of an audio/video interaction between an agent of a business and a customer. The storable representation is analyzed to determine the service quality provided to the customer by the agent. Analysis data associated with the audio/video interaction is generated. An apparatus includes a storage device configured to receive and store the storable representation of the audio/video interaction. A report generator is configured to generate analysis data, which is fed back to the agent and represents the quality of service rendered by the agent to the customer. The agent can be informed of at least one agent performance element that was well performed and at least one agent performance element that could be performed even better.

L'invention concerne un procédé qui consiste à recevoir une représentation stockable d'une interaction audio/vidéo entre un agent d'une entreprise et un client. La représentation stockable est analysée afin que soit déterminée la qualité de service fournie au client par l'agent. Des données d'analyse associées à l'interaction audio/vidéo sont générées. Un appareil comprend un dispositif de stockage conçu pour recevoir et stocker la représentation stockable de l'interaction audio/vidéo. Un générateur de rapport est conçu pour générer des données d'analyse, qui sont renvoyées à l'agent et qui représentent la qualité de service fournie par l'agent au client. L'agent peut être informé d'au moins un élément de performance d'agent qui a donné satisfaction et d'au moins un élément de performance d'agent pouvant être amélioré.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: AUDIO/VIDEO SERVICE QUALITY ANALYSIS OF CUSTOMER/AGENT INTERACTION
ANALYSE DE QUALITE DE SERVICE AUDIO/VIDEO D'INTERACTION CLIENT/AGENT

An apparatus includes a storage device configured to receive and store the storable representation of the audio/video interaction. A report generator is configured to generate analysis data, which is fed back to the agent and represents the quality of service rendered by the agent to the customer. The agent can be informed of at least one agent performance element that was well performed and at least one agent performance element that could be performed even better.
